structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.catch_line: Record of proceedings of the board.
law.text: The board shall keep a well-bound book entitled "Record of Board of Drainage Commissioners of .... County, Kentucky," in which shall be recorded the minutes of all meetings, proceedings, certificates, bonds given by all employees, accounts and expenditures allowed and orders paid and all corporate acts in reference to the district. This record shall be open at all times to the inspection of anyone interested.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380b-34.
